net.sytes.botg.array.spectrum

Class WindowFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sytes.botg.array.spectrum.WindowFunction

  • public class WindowFunction
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class that provides various window types that can be applied on sample vectors See Wikipedia for more info
    Author:
    jhillenb

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  WindowFunction.WindowType 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double[] apply(WindowFunction.WindowType wt, double[] x)
      applies the WindowType wt on the input vector x and
      returns the weighted result as double[]

      returns null if wt was not defined yet
      double apply(WindowFunction.WindowType wt, int i, int n, double x_i)
      applies the WindowType wt for a single sample x_i at index i of a window of length n
      double[] generate(WindowFunction.WindowType wt, int n)
      generates a window of size n for WindowType wt

      returns null if wt was not defined yet
      double generate(WindowFunction.WindowType wt, int i, int n)
      generates a single window weight of the WindowType wt for the specified index i in window of length n

      returns -1.0 if WindowType was not defined yet

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
